1.title: The Duchess & The Divorce
1.plot: Sisters are shocked by news of Tamar's divorce. Traci reveals secret. Tamar storms out of dinner.

2.title: Allegedly
2.plot: Sisters are shocked by news of Tamar's divorce. Traci reveals secret. Tamar storms out of dinner.

3.title: Living Legend
3.plot: With Tamar in hiding, will she miss Toni's 50th birthday? Toni's stunned by a shocking party foul. Traci pressures her son over baby news. Tamar performs and Toni receives the Soul Train Legend Award.

4.title: Law & Order
4.plot: Towanda's decision to take legal action could tear the Braxton Family apart. Toni's shocking announcement. Towanda's ex blasts her on social media.Traci fears son Kevin is not ready to be a dad & puts him in baby bootcamp.

5.title: Don't Rock the Boat
5.plot: Traci is snubbed by Tamar on her movie set; Toni shoots a new music video; Trina's pricey buy.

7.title: Plus One, Plus Drama
7.plot: Toni finally tells her sisters she's engaged but it causes sibling rivalry. Traci plans the shower.

8.title: Shattered Dreams
8.plot: Tamar & Towanda take over Toni's wedding planning; Traci celebrates her son's baby shower, but her joy is cut short when she receives devastating news about her upcoming tour with her sisters and fears they are to blame.

13.title: Duchess & The Dude Ranch
13.plot: Toni faces Traci about the divided Sisterhood; Towanda speaks out; Traci escapes family drama at a dude ranch where she is joined by outrageous reality stars; in a crazy turn of events, Flavor Flav and New York reunite to turn the rodeo upside down.

14.title: Not Today Satan
14.plot: Toni is shocked when Trina and Towanda reveal the truth about Traci's role in the strike; Tamar speaks out on family drama; Towanda hatches a plan to heal The Sisterhood; Traci returns from the cattle drive and must perform amidst tense sister drama.

1.title: The Bermuda Triangle
1.plot: Ready to relaunch her singing career, R&B superstar Toni invites her four younger sisters to join her for a benefit concert in Bermuda. But old rivalries and resentments threaten to ruin what was meant to be a joyful family reunion.

2.title: Taste of a Wedding Singer
2.plot: The Braxton sisters fear that Trina's weight gain & alcohol abuse are symptoms of depression. They consult a family therapist, and surprise Trina with an intervention. Progress is is made, and the sisters hold hands at the end.

3.title: It's My Birthday
3.plot: The ladies celebrate Toni's birthday with a trip to Miami; Tamar is upset when Toni cancels plans to go clubbing and picks a fight at dinner.

4.title: I Love LA
4.plot: Toni is getting an award. The Braxtons travel to Los Angeles, and stay with Tamar and Vince. They are upset by her "house rules." Toni then shocks her family by confessing she has lupus. She reveals this news at the award ceremony.

5.title: From Russia with Love
5.plot: Toni meets with Vince to discuss her upcoming Russia gig and her career. She wants to wok Vegas show, but is concerned no one will hire her due to her Lupus. Traci is upset when she learns that she can't go to Russia due to a visa issue. Rehearsals go poorly. Trina doesn't know her moves, and Tamar calls to say she can't go to Russia. Towanda agrees to fill in. Trina goes to counseling with Gabe. Towanda shops for a wardrobe for Toni, but Toni isn't happy with her choices. Trina and Towanda pack and say goodbye their families. After arrival in Russia, they learn that ...

6.title: Getting the Band Back Together
6.plot: Vince and the Braxton sisters try to get Toni to agree to do a family album. Towanda moves into Toni's house, and chaos ensues. Trina works on her marriage with Gabe and considers buying a house with him.

7.title: Dog of a Birthday Party
7.plot: The Braxton's throw a 60th birthday party for their mother Evelyn at Tamar and Vincent's house in LA. Despite their good intentions, the sister's aren't sure of the perfect gift for their Mom, and argue over the specifics of the party.

8.title: To Play or Not to Playboy
8.plot: Tamar tries to dissuade Toni from posing for Playboy, even booking a nude shoot for her. Evelyn goes on her fist blind date with a white guy. Tamar throws an "appreciation" party for Vince to convince him to help her with her solo album.

9.title: You Can't Go Home Again
9.plot: On Tamar's advice, the Braxtons fly to Maryland to visit to have a family reunion with their father. They visit their childhood house but are kicked out by the new owners. Dad doesn't show up to brunch leaving the sisters devastated.

10.title: Guess Who's Coming to Dinner
10.plot: The girls' father attends a family dinner causing a huge blow up with their mom. Towanda delivers separation papers to her husband. Traci commits to moving to Atlanta but Toni decides she is moving to LA jeopardizing the Braxton album.

11.title: Braxton Family Reunion
11.plot: Following the season finale, talk show host Wendy Williams dishes with the girls and gets the real scoop on the special surprises the season held out to viewers.

1.title: R.E.S.P.E.C.T
1.plot: The sisters deal with newfound fame.

2.title: Beauty School Drop-Out
2.plot: Tamar starts recording her solo album.

3.title: A Snooping Dog
3.plot: Gabe installs GPS in Trina's cell phone.

4.title: New Doo-Whop Chick
4.plot: Toni asks Traci to sing backup at a gig.

6.title: The Family Unites
6.plot: The family gathers for Toni's surgery.

7.title: Family Feuding
7.plot: Traci and Tamar fight and go to therapy.

8.title: NYC or Bust
8.plot: The sisters prep for a huge gig in NYC.

9.title: Like Husband, Like Wife
9.plot: Trina admits to having an affair.

10.title: Sisters at War
10.plot: The sisters prepare for Toni's tribute.

11.title: Desert Divas
11.plot: Babyface lures Toni back in the studio. Trina shocks Toni at charity event, and sisters are outraged over Trina's plan to include Gabe in store idea.

13.title: Critical Condition
13.plot: Vince is hospitalized with a blood clot.

14.title: Stir Crazy
14.plot: Trina performs original songs at a gig.

15.title: Soul-o Act
15.plot: Tamar performs at the Soul Train Awards.

16.title: Bridezilla
16.plot: The girls try to plan Evelyn's wedding.

18.title: A Clean Break
18.plot: Evelyn calls off her wedding to Doc.

19.title: We Got You
19.plot: Tamar and Vince seek a doctor's advice.

20.title: Reunion Special
20.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

23.title: Great Eggspectations
23.plot: Trina preps for video; freezer babies.

24.title: Birthday Party or Go Home
24.plot: Trina's video shoot; a surprise party.

26.title: For Better or Worse
26.plot: A concert in St. Lucia; vows renewed.

1.title: Ciao, Braxtons!
1.plot: Toni takes her sisters to Italy. Tamar is promoting her single and can't join them. Toni confronts Tamar about tension between the sisters.

2.title: Lights, Camera, Braxton Drama
2.plot: The sisters visit Toni on her movie set in Canada for some bonding time. After a fight, Tamar leaves. Tamar and Towanda try to hash out their issues.

3.title: The Tamar-vention
3.plot: Tamar's music career is taking off, but conflict among the sisters forces them all into therapy. Tempers soon erupt, and Toni storms out.

4.title: Papa Knows Best
4.plot: Michael Braxton attempts to reunite his daughters. Tamar is tired of feeling attacked by her sisters; Toni demands an apology; and Traci storms off.

5.title: Traci's Bustin' Out!
5.plot: The sisters call a truce. Toni considers quitting the music biz. Traci hosts a Women's Cancer Walk. Trina pushes family clothing store idea.

6.title: Party in the DMV
6.plot: The sisters tangle with relatives at dad's birthday party, then rush to Atlanta when mom Evelyn is hospitalized. Toni meets with Babyface.

7.title: A Diva's Dilemma
7.plot: Babyface lures Toni back in the studio, and Trina embarrasses Toni at celebrity charity event. Gabe gives Trina a new ring; sisters are outraged when they learn Trina wants to include Gabe in their store plan.

8.title: What's Cookin' in the Oven?
8.plot: Tamar's pregnancy reveal. Trina records a new song and thinks about moving to LA. Sisters challenge each other's cooking skills with Mommy's recipes.

9.title: Hello Baby, Goodbye Dog
9.plot: Tamar gets first ultrasound. Traci plans to surprise family with her motorcycle skills. Braxton clan has dog memorial; Evelyn announces move to LA.

10.title: Sister Act
10.plot: Toni asks Trina to perform her songs at a concert. Trina is excited to debut her new single but shows up unprepared; Toni considers cutting the song. Evelyn moves to LA and makes Tamar take a parenting class.

11.title: Go Hard or Go Home!
11.plot: Trina and Traci have major solo gigs, but Tamar and Toni have harsh criticism for Trina. Towanda sets up Tamar with a new gay assistant.

12.title: Braxton Leading Lady
12.plot: Toni hosts a screening for her first lead in a movie. Tamar has pregnancy woes. Evelyn goes on blind dates. Trina's ready to open a store without Gabe.

13.title: Rumor Has It
13.plot: Toni decides if she wants to record again with Babyface. Tamar storms out of her shower after Toni makes a big announcement. The sisters are worried by Traci's bizarre behavior and uncover shocking news.

14.title: A Very Public Affair
14.plot: Traci and Trina face questions about their marriages at the Essence Festival. Toni works on her single with Babyface. Tamar promotes her new album.

15.title: I Don't Have No Baby
15.plot: Traci questions her husband about illegitimate son and confronts sisters about gossiping. Toni & Tamar prepare for their tours. Tamar's big apology.

16.title: Back to Braxton Business
16.plot: Toni is under pressure as she preps for her first tour in five years. Tamar rehearses while sick for her album tour. Traci gets her own radio show.

17.title: Tour De Divas
17.plot: Toni fights nerves to make a triumphant return to the stage. Trina struggles with her performance in Toni's show. Tamar shoots a lavish music video.

18.title: Birthday-Zilla
18.plot: Sisters return home from Toni's tour. Towanda preps for 40th birthday party and clashes with Tamar. Trina works with Gabe on new business, Bar Chix.

19.title: Birthday Bare-All
19.plot: Toni & Babyface rehearse for tour. Towanda poses nude, fires Trina and throws mega 40th birthday bash. Tamar and Towanda's tension finally explodes.

20.title: #Wack #Family
20.plot: After months of tension, Tamar and Towanda go head-to-head; Toni tries to mediate. Toni & Babyface shoot "Hurt You" video. Tamar performs on Arsenio.

21.title: They Threw a Shoe at You?!?
21.plot: Tamar and Towanda put aside feud for Toni's birthday. Evelyn battles a stalker. Toni pushes sisters in ballroom dance class. Trina explores sex shop.

22.title: Chix in a Row
22.plot: Toni sings at Breeders' Cup; starts biography. Tamar invites sisters to join her on tour. Trina's Bar Chix launch party. Traci records for her album.

23.title: Shade Anonymous
23.plot: Trina joins Tamar on the road; Tamar's upset the other sisters aren't coming to see her show. Vince gets medical tests. Toni's book. Pulled over!

24.title: Who Wants to Be a Braxton?
24.plot: Sisters play for a million dollars on a game show. Evelyn is arrested for carrying a taser. Toni talks to writer about bankruptcies & biggest regret.

25.title: Award Show Shade!
25.plot: Tamar is honored at Soul Train Awards; receives Grammy nominations. Tamar makes sisters sign contract to do album. Tamar and Towanda tension explodes.

26.title: It's All Good!
26.plot: Tamar attends Grammy Awards. Vince throws an after-party staffed by Trina's Bar Chix and the whole family is there. Vince's birthday; a christening.

1.title: Bright Lights, Big Breakdowns
1.plot: The girls are in NYC for Toni's Broadway show but tension flares up at Tamar's birthday party when a guest offends the sisters and Tamar defends him.

2.title: Sisters on the Verge
2.plot: After an explosive family dinner, the sisters go on a therapy retreat. Traci accuses Tamar's assistant of grabbing her, but Tamar blows up and insists Traci attacked her first.

3.title: Jamaican Me Crazy
3.plot: After all the drama, Evelyn insists the sisters go to Jamaica to have some fun. Toni performs; the girls parasail and party.

4.title: I Ain't Scared of No Demons
4.plot: Trina, Towanda and Traci move to LA to start the Braxton album, but Toni and Tamar disagree over how to produce the project. Tamar works on her tour. Traci and Kevin continue their Marriage Bootcamp therapy.

5.title: Starting Off on a Bad Note
5.plot: The sisters start work on the album but clash about the details, especially Toni and Tamar. Evelyn has a piano delivered for inspiration, and Tamar gets the take-over spirit.

6.title: Dares & Distractions
6.plot: Sisters get surprise visits from brother Michael and Trina's husband Gabe. Tensions rise as the girls struggle to make progress on their album.

7.title: A Single Decision
7.plot: The sisters reconsider the album and decide to do a single instead. Trina clashes with Traci and Towanda over Gabe and their housewarming party. Tamar preps for her tour.

8.title: Booked to Capacity
8.plot: Toni's book reveals shocking information. Tamar stresses over final details for her solo tour. Traci struggles at a photo shoot for her album.

9.title: Surprise Me Not
9.plot: Towanda, Traci and Trina surprise Tamar on stage. Tamar is thrown off-guard, and the surprise completely backfires.

10.title: A Split Decision
10.plot: The sisters meet to work out issues after Tamar's Atlanta show, but drama escalates. Traci's music video; a Braxton is rushed to the hospital; and Tamar considers a drastic decision about the sisterhood.

18.title: Divine Intervention
18.plot: A major disagreement erupts and splits the sisters. The Braxton parents call an emergency family meeting with well-known advisor Bishop T.D. Jakes.

22.title: It's a Family Thing
22.plot: Traci performs at Toni's show; all the sisters are there. Trina's new man meets Daddy. Traci confronts her son and his fiancée. Tamar throws a party for Logan's second birthday.

23.title: The Feud!
23.plot: The sisters get competitive on Family Feud. Tamar shocks Evelyn with her new video. Traci forces Kevin Jr. and fiancee to care for a fake baby. Trina goes barhopping with potential Bar Chix; things get wild.

24.title: Restraint Thineself
24.plot: Tamar is concerned that Trina's boyfriend wants a private meeting with their father. Towanda shocks all with her role in a new theater project. Sisters attend Trina's test run for Bar Chix; bartender blows up.

25.title: An Engaging Question
25.plot: After another stressful delay with Bar Chix, Trina's relationship takes a major turn. Tamar has ambitious photo shoot for her new album, but wardrobe is all wrong. Toni proposes Christmas album with sisters.

26.title: Making Fetch Happen
26.plot: Trina finds out what's inside secret box from Jacent. Towanda and Trina have news for Toni. Sisters start to work on Toni's Christmas album, but busy schedules and past issues stir up drama.

27.title: Braxton Family Secrets Part 1
27.plot:

28.title: Braxton Family Secrets Part 2
28.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

29.title: Braxton Family Christmas
29.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

1.title: Not My Mama
1.plot: Evelyn suffers from a stroke, which turns into an East Coast vs. West Coast sister battle over Mommy! Evelyn's near death experience sparks a new lease on life while Traci faces a health scare of her own.

2.title: Man Enough for Mommy
2.plot: Trina hires a matchmaker for Mommy in Atlanta. Toni craves new experiences and takes the plunge. Tamar wants the Hollywood Medium, Tyler Henry to connect with angels, but Trina is not on board & tension rises.

3.title: S--- Gets Real
3.plot: Tamar opens up about being "fired" from The Real and tells her side of the story. Trina suspects she has a stalker and wants to get a gun, but her sisters object. Miss E's date is crashed by Tamar & Toni.

4.title: Not Famous Enough
4.plot: Towanda spills the tea about Trina's man. Traci worries about her surgery. Tamar gets upset when Towanda goes missing at her fashion show. Daddy issues arise for Tamar & Trina.

5.title: Oh You Tried It!
5.plot: Toni screens her biopic movie; Tamar is tried when she meets her on screen counterpart. Towanda reveals her secret to Trina. Trina finally deals with her sister issues.

6.title: You Gotta Get Pelvic to Pelvic!
6.plot: Toni performs in Brooklyn; dinner disaster. Towanda's partner disappoints her at their dance competition; Tamar critiques Towanda. Toni tells Tamar her plans to change her show that might upset Trina & Towanda.

7.title: Toni Got a Ditty!
7.plot: Tamar is uber-anxious when she performs for Smokey Robinson. Toni reveals she has a date. Towanda's secret appointment; sisters are shocked. Trina confronts her sisters.

8.title: You Want That Old Thang Back?
8.plot: Trina shocks all when she reveals she reached out to her ex, Gabe; Tamar disapproves. Toni has the takeover spirit in a sister cook off. Towanda's challenged during acting class.

9.title: Wasband's Back
9.plot: Trina has a candid convo with her ex, Gabe, but it takes a turn for the worse when past infidelities are brought up. Emotions run high at Toni's final show with Trina & Towanda as her background singers.

10.title: What's the T with You and B?
10.plot: Toni celebrates her sisters' final performance and has a surprise visitor for them. Toni invites a man to dinner. Tamar insists on coaching mommy for her runway debut. Gabe has a shocking proposal for Trina.

11.title: This Is Not About ReKindlerization... Or Is It?
11.plot: Trina continues to move forward with Gabe, but Gabe seems to be looking for more than closure! Tamar's photo shoot. Traci records a new, sexy album but her manager has doubts.

12.title: Trick Thy Sister
12.plot: Gabe comes clean to Trina in a shocking admission. Tamar performs at an exclusive event. Traci tricks her sisters at her studio session. Toni's dinner is ruined when Tamar feels insulted.

13.title: Flippin' the Bird
13.plot: Tamar has a big surprise for the sisters, but their reaction shocks her. Trina worries Towanda's new place may mean a big move. Trina seeks a hypnotist to conquer her fear but her sisters interrupt her session.

14.title: Broadway or Bust
14.plot: Trina's sons have a showdown with her ex, Gabe, and they don't hold back! Tamar breaks the news to producers that her sisters won't do the Broadway show. Towanda performs for an agent.

15.title: Spilling the Tea
15.plot: Tensions rise at a sister slumber party at Toni's house. A trip down memory lane opens old wounds leading to a sister showdown. Toni has enough of "bad attitude;" Tamar storms out. Exclusive footage.

16.title: Tabloids, Rumors, & Repercussions
16.plot: Tamar faces shocking tabloid rumors about her marriage. Towanda finally files for divorce. Toni gets grilled about her new romance. Traci confronts Tamar about her posts on social media.

17.title: You Run Your Mouth, I'll Run My Business
17.plot: Towanda's divorce battle continues & it's war! A sudden glitch injures Toni right before she's about to perform. A taste test quickly turns south when Tamar and Trina get heated over Bar Chix!

18.title: The Mother of All Insults
18.plot: The sisters' blowout fight leads to the mother of all insults. Tamar reveals a shocking secret she's kept from her sisters. Trina scouts for her pop up Bar Chix location.

20.title: Back in the Hot Seat
20.plot: Trina faces final divorce decisions and stresses over Bar Chix. The sisters grill Trina's new man Jacent. Tamar gets feedback from the sisters on her single. Traci's pushed to finally deal with her issues.

21.title: Pop Up, Pop Off
21.plot: When the sisters hear concerning rumors before Trina's Pop Up Bar Chix event, they confront Trina. Trina reveals the truth about a shocking arrest at her home. Tempers flare in Towanda's custody battle.

22.title: Opposing Counsel
22.plot: Tamar's new single sparks drama when Mommy is shocked to find out it's written about her and Daddy's divorce. The gloves come off in Towanda's custody battle. Traci does a photoshoot for her whiskey line.

23.title: Donde Esta Daddy?
23.plot: The Braxtons arrive in Puerto Vallarta, Mexico for their family trip-but where's Daddy? While the sisters are having fun, surprise guests threaten to ruin the vacation.

24.title: The Other Mrs. Braxton
24.plot: Daddy brings his wife to Mexico, stunning Miss Evelyn and the girls. All hell breaks loose when Toni invites Daddy and his wife to dinner. After years of misconceptions, the girls learn the shocking truth!

26.title: There's Something About Mommy
26.plot: Toni discovers a scary new Lupus symptom that could change her life forever. Towanda reveals shocking news about her divorce. Mommy finally opens up about Daddy and the Mexico trip.

-1.title: Catch Up with Braxton Family Values
-1.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

imdb.plot outline: Evelyn reveals the news to her daughters about her mini stroke sending the sisters into a panic. Toni and Tamar team up to persuade her to move back to L.A., but the other sisters want her to stay in Atlanta to recuperate. Towanda seeks her sisters help as her daughter Brooke needs to understand the changes a young girl faces leading to uncomfortable questions. Trina announces to her sisters that she has been going to therapy to deal with her issues at hand and confronts them. Trina contacts her ex-husband Gabe leading to visiting a therapist to form a reconciliation in order for her to move on once and for all but Gabe has other plans. Traci becomes worried after receiving some unsettling news from her doctor resulting her to undergo surgery. Trina visits a hypnotherapist to deal with her fear of birds, Tamar and Towanda help Trina to confront her fear by leaving Trina so she can face it alone. Toni has been singing about heartache, struggles and fears for years, but this season she conquers one major fear that's been holding her back. Traci goes back into the studio to record tracks for her sophomore album, she invites her sisters Toni, Towanda and Trina to a session later to find out they were tricked asking them to provide background vocals on the song "Broken Things".
imdb.title: Braxton Family Values
plot: The tight-knit Braxton sisters, Grammy-winning artist Toni Braxton, Traci, Towanda, Trina and Tamar, and their headstrong mother share an inside look at their lives and the drama of family chaos.::Wetv

Evelyn reveals the news to her daughters about her mini stroke sending the sisters into a panic. Toni and Tamar team up to persuade her to move back to L.A., but the other sisters want her to stay in Atlanta to recuperate. Towanda seeks her sisters help as her daughter Brooke needs to understand the changes a young girl faces leading to uncomfortable questions. Trina announces to her sisters that she has been going to therapy to deal with her issues at hand and confronts them. Trina contacts her ex-husband Gabe leading to visiting a therapist to form a reconciliation in order for her to move on once and for all but Gabe has other plans. Traci becomes worried after receiving some unsettling news from her doctor resulting her to undergo surgery. Trina visits a hypnotherapist to deal with her fear of birds, Tamar and Towanda help Trina to confront her fear by leaving Trina so she can face it alone. Toni has been singing about heartache, struggles and fears for years, but this season she conquers one major fear that's been holding her back. Traci goes back into the studio to record tracks for her sophomore album, she invites her sisters Toni, Towanda and Trina to a session later to find out they were tricked asking them to provide background vocals on the song "Broken Things".::KW
